title: A State Solution? (with Mercedes Villalba MSP)
itunes:title: A State Solution? (with Mercedes Villalba MSP)
description:
Labour Member of the Scottish Parliament Mercedes Villalba says the U.K. could emulate France to solve rising energy prices. She tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that one potential solution would be a publicly-owned energy company.

Plus, Jon Restell, Chief Executive of the healthcare union Managers in Partnership, says Britain may want to move on from the pandemic but there are still thousands of beds being used for Covid patients while inflation is eroding the NHS budget and wages.
